      Compute DGK decryption c = g^m * h^r (mod n) c^vp (mod p) = g^{vp*m} (mod p), Because h^{vp} (mod p) = 1 Use the pre-computed hashmap to retrieve m.

      • encrypt

        public static BigInteger encrypt(long plaintext,
                                 DGKPublicKey pubKey)
        Encrypt plaintext with DGK Public Key Compute ciphertext = g^{m}h^{r} (mod n)
        Parameters:
        pubKey - - use this to encrypt plaintext
        plaintext -
        Returns:
        - DGK ciphertext throws HomomorphicException - If the plaintext is larger than the plaintext supported by DGK Public Key, an exception will be thrown

      • encrypt

        public static BigInteger encrypt(BigInteger plaintext,
                                 DGKPublicKey pk)

      • decrypt

        public static long decrypt(BigInteger ciphertext,
                           DGKPrivateKey privKey)
        Compute DGK decryption c = g^m * h^r (mod n) c^vp (mod p) = g^{vp*m} (mod p), Because h^{vp} (mod p) = 1 Use the pre-computed hashmap to retrieve m.
        Parameters:
        privKey - - used to decrypt ciphertext
        ciphertext - - DGK ciphertext
        Returns:
        plaintext
        Throws:
        HomomorphicException - - If the ciphertext is larger than N, an exception will be thrown

      • add

        public static BigInteger add(BigInteger ciphertext1,
                             BigInteger ciphertext2,
                             DGKPublicKey pk)
                      throws HomomorphicException
        returns the sum of the Paillier encrypted values Note: The result is still encrypted Warning: If the sum exceeds N, it is subject to N
        Parameters:
        ciphertext1 - - Encrypted Paillier value
        ciphertext2 - - Encrypted Paillier value
        pk - - used to encrypt both ciphertexts
        Returns:
        Throws:
        HomomorphicException - - If either ciphertext is greater than N or negative, throw an exception

      • add_plaintext

        public static BigInteger add_plaintext(BigInteger ciphertext,
                                       BigInteger plaintext,
                                       DGKPublicKey pk)
                                throws HomomorphicException
        returns the sum of the DGK encrypted value and plaintext value Warning: If the sum exceeds u, it is subject to mod u
        Parameters:
        ciphertext - - DGK encrypted value
        plaintext -
        pk - - was used to encrypt ciphertext
        Returns:
        Encrypted sum of ciphertext and plaintext
        Throws:
        HomomorphicException - - If a ciphertext is negative or exceeds N or plaintext is negative or exceeds u

        Parameters:

        ciphertext2 - - DGK ciphertext
        pk - - used to encrypt both ciphertexts
        Returns:

                                            BigInteger plaintext,
                                            DGKPublicKey pk)

        Parameters:
        ciphertext - - Encrypted DGK value
        plaintext -
        pk - - used to encrypt ciphertext
        Returns:
        DGK encrypted ciphertext with ciphertext1 - ciphertext2

      • multiply

        public static BigInteger multiply(BigInteger ciphertext,
                                  BigInteger plaintext,
                                  DGKPublicKey pk)
                           throws HomomorphicException
        Compute the DGK encrypted value of ciphertext multiplied by the plaintext.
        Parameters:
        ciphertext - - DGK encrypted value
        scalar - - plaintext value
        pk - - DGK Public key the encrypted ciphertext
        Returns:
        Throws:
        HomomorphicException - If ciphertext is negative or exceeds N or plaintext exceeds u

      • divide

        public static BigInteger divide(BigInteger ciphertext,
                                BigInteger plaintext,
                                DGKPublicKey pk)
                         throws HomomorphicException
        Compute the division of the DGK cipher-text and a plaintext. Warning: Divide will only work correctly on perfect divisor like 2|20, it will work. If you try 3|20, it will NOT work and you will get a wrong answer! If you want to do 3|20, you MUST use a division protocol from Veugen paper
        Parameters:
        ciphertext - - DGK ciphertext
        divisor - - plaintext value
        pk - - was used to encrypt ciphertext
        Returns:
        Encrypted DGK value equal to ciphertext/plaintext
        Throws:
        HomomorphicException

      • divide

        public static BigInteger divide(BigInteger ciphertext,
                                long plaintext,
                                DGKPublicKey pk)
                         throws HomomorphicException
        Throws:
        HomomorphicException

      • sum_product

        public static BigInteger sum_product(List<BigInteger> ciphertext,
                                     List<Long> plaintext,
                                     DGKPublicKey pk)
                              throws HomomorphicException
        Compute the sum-product. It computes the scalar multiplication between the array of Encrypted and plaintext values. Then it computes the encrypted sum.
        Parameters:
        cipher - - List of ciphertext
        plain - - List of plaintext
        pk - - DGK Public Key used to encrypt list of ciphertext
        Returns:
        DGK Encrypted sum product
        Throws:
        HomomorphicException

      • sum_product

        public static BigInteger sum_product(BigInteger[] ciphertext,
                                     Long[] plaintext,
                                     DGKPublicKey pk)
                              throws HomomorphicException
        Compute the sum-product. It computes the scalar multiplication between the array of Encrypted and plaintext values. Then it computes the encrypted sum.
        Parameters:
        pk - - DGK Public Key used to encrypt values in cipher-text list
        cipher - - Array of Encrypted DGK values
        plain - - Array of plaintext values
        Returns:
        DGK Encrypted sum-product
        Throws:
        HomomorphicException - - If the size of plaintext array and ciphertext array isn't equal
